section.title: What is New and Noteworthy in Drools 6.5.0
Configurable ThreadFactory
section.para: Some runtime environments (like for example Google App Engine) don't allow to directly create new Threads. For this reason it is now possible to plug your own ThreadFactory implementation by setting the system property drools.threadFactory with its class name. section.title: Use of any expressions as input for a query
section.para: It is now possible to use as input argument for a query both the field of a fact as in:
section.programlisting:
query contains(String $s, String $c) $s := String( this.contains( $c ) ) end
rule PersonNamesWithA when $p : Person() contains( $p.name, "a"; ) then end
section.para: and more in general any kind of valid expression like in:
section.programlisting:
query checkLength(String $s, int $l) $s := String( length == $l ) end
rule CheckPersonNameLength when $i : Integer() $p : Person() checkLength( $p.name, 1 + $i + $p.age; ) then end
